actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize and request the President to advance Major Ronald Tiffany on the retired list of the United States Army Reserve.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to advance a named individual on the retired list of the U.S. Army Reserve to the grade of lieutenant colonel, retroactive to the date of his retirement.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and request the President to advance Major Ronald Tiffany on the retired list of the United States Army Reserve.
